title: Geriatric Town Hall Battle, Poll Shaming? 10.16.20
itunes:title: Geriatric Town Hall Battle, Poll Shaming? 10.16.20
description:
In episode 738, Jack and Miles are joined by writer Jason Pargin to discuss Covid-19 spreading, Joe Biden and Trump's town halls, the pitfalls of polling, what we're watching on Netflix, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Wearing a neck gaiter may be worse than no mask at all, researchers find
  2. Neck Gaiters May Protect Against COVID-19 Spread
  3. One client in one spin studio that followed all the rules triggers a coronavirus outbreak with at least 61 cases
  4. CDC says airborne transmission plays a role in coronavirus spread in a long-awaited update after a website error last month
  5. When COVID-19 superspreaders are talking, where you sit in the room matters
  6. Anthony Fauci Urges Americans To Reconsider Thanksgiving Gatherings Amid Pandemic
  7. COVID-19 cases rising in 39 states – 9 months into the pandemic: 'We are overwhelmed'
  8. Why Christmas 2020 Could Be An All-Time Nightmare
  9. Live Updates From Town Halls: Trump Faces Tough Questions and Biden Promises a Court Stance
  10. Pollster Pitfalls
  11. Zoey Punches the Future in the Dick
  12. WATCH: Ladybug - Garçons

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
